game_description: All is fair in love and VR! Friends turn foe as you set foot in the VR battle arenas of Kingdom Brawl. From the creators of Arizona Sunshine, set in the universe of Skyworld, comes an action-packed real-time multiplayer game, exclusively for VR. In Kingdom Brawl, you collect and upgrade dozens of cards to build a powerful deck, and watch your cards come to life as you cast spells and summon forces to wipe your enemy off the map. Join a clan, take on opponents from around the globe in regular online tournaments, and claim your place on the global leaderboards. This is no friendly battle… this is war! • Play dozens of cards to deploy troops and cast spells • Challenge friends worldwide in cross-platform multiplayer • Compete in over 20 unique battle arenas • Join a clan, battle for glory and claim your rewards! • Claim a place on the global leaderboards • Make a name for yourself in regular tournaments • Vanquish your enemies with dragons and fireballs! • Wage war and be victorious!
Languages: English, Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: I missed out on this game when it was in its prime. Now there is no multi-player at all, especially after the last server update which caused a lot of sound problems and crashes to desktop. Don't get me wrong. I would rather play a good table top game over just about anything else available, but people move on to other games. You can wait and wait for a game now and there will be no one available. Buy it for the AI gameplay. Coming up with a good deck to always beat the AI became my objective. It took many games for me to consistently win at the highest levels and I found it to be a memorable experience.
review_2: Once I got this game I got so excited but when I started playing the game I couldn’t connect with players and I had enough sky coins for a skin not knowing I couldn’t buy it. Please can I get a refund!
review_3: I really really enjoy this game, ans always enjoyed this kind of games so I might be a bit biased. The graphics and mechanics are great imo, you can upgrade and buy new units and spells. Sadly it's always hard to find a online battle for me, wish it was a bit more active as it's one of a kind for me.
review_4: My favorite style of game and happy to see it on the oculus, has potential to be a popular pvp game. Fix the flyers having all the advantages, why make a map that has lava damaging my ground units?, and worst of all there are not enough players to find a match. I just play against the AI and farm out gold but hopefully this game gets some advertising.
review_5: Those who play with the left hand are not recommended to download the game. A game that doesn't even allow people who play left-handed should delete itself from the list of games!! The game only lets you play against the computer. Sorry I bought this game!
